text: Videos and transcripts from today’s remote conference on Design and Exclusion (which I didn’t know about until today) <https://x.design.blog/>

attachments.title: Home
attachments.text: The products we build can perpetuate exclusion and marginalization, often despite our best intentions. On April 21, join a free, online conversation with design and technology leaders about the people and groups that we sometimes exclude, and the need to create products and services that welcome them.

text: Nice, thanks for sharing. Listened to it a bit, it's quite powerful (the snippet that I heard)
